summary: This document details the revocation of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2014 Trust by Jeffrey E. Epstein, who serves as the Grantor. The document outlines the roles of the Trustees and includes acknowledgments from them regarding the revocation.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual who revokes the trust, as stated in the document.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the Trustees who acknowledges the revocation of the trust.

persons.name: James E. Staley
persons.context: James E. Staley is another Trustee who acknowledges the revocation of the trust.

persons.name: David Mitchell
persons.context: David Mitchell is also a Trustee who acknowledges the revocation of the trust.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the Grantor of the trust, while Darren K. Indyke is one of the Trustees.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the Grantor of the trust, while James E. Staley is one of the Trustees.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the Grantor of the trust, while David Mitchell is one of the Trustees.
Darren K. Indyke and James E. Staley are both Trustees of the same trust.
Darren K. Indyke and David Mitchell are both Trustees of the same trust.
James E. Staley and David Mitchell are both Trustees of the same trust.

events.title: Revocation of Jeffrey E. Epstein 2014 Trust
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein revokes the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2014 Trust, effective immediately.

keyFacts: The document is a formal revocation of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2014 Trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the Grantor of the trust.
Darren K. Indyke, James E. Staley, and David Mitchell are identified as Trustees.
The revocation is acknowledged by all Trustees.
The document is notarized in New York.
